sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./boardStyle.css" export default function Board() { const [getLetters, setLetters] = useState([]) function handleKeyPress() { window.onkeydown = function(e) { if(e.keyCode >= 65 && e.keyCode <= 122){ setLetters([{...e.key}]) } } } handleKeyPress(); return (
{getLetters[0]}
{getLetters[1]}
{getLetters[2]}
{getLetters[3]}
{getLetters[4]}
) }
